text: Philipp Ludescher (born 3 January 1987 in Feldkirch) is an Austrian former professional racing cyclist. ==Major results== ;2003 : 1st 20px Road race, National Youth Road Championships : 1st 20px Youth race, National Cyclo-cross Championships ==External links== * * Category:Austrian male cyclists Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:People from Feldkirch, Vorarlberg Category:Sportspeople from Vorarlberg
title: Philipp Ludescher
